content: texas topper pattern by ginger hayes for mckinney knittery supplies 1 skein spincycle plump sz us 10 16 circular needle one stitch marker for beginning/end of round tapestry needle to weave in ends techniques long tail cast on knit k purl p knit 2 together k2tog purl 2 together p2tog pattern using long tail cast on cast on 56 stitches join in the round being careful to not twist stitches *k2 p2* all the way around the row repeat above pattern until your work measures approximately 8 from cast on edge try on for size decreases will only add about 1 to the length of the hat begin decreases decrease row 1 *k2 p2tog* all the way around the row decrease row 2 *k2 p1* all the way around the row decrease row 3 *k2tog p1* all the way around the row decrease row 4 *k1 p1* all the way around the row leaving a 10 tail thread yarn onto tapestry needle remove stitch marker and using the tapestry needle bring yarn through the loops on needle weave in ends block if desired or let your head do the work 😊 yarn in photo is spincycle plump in colorway rhinestone cowboy a mckinney knittery exclusive
